channel.title: Alex Olivier
channel.description: Lover of technology, Editor of It's Kinda Cool, and follower of all sorts of geekery! Former Microsoftie

item.title: Start spreading the news...
item.description:
In 5 days, I am moving to New York! Qubit, the startup I work for, currently has a sales office in Manhatten, and I have being sent over there to setup the client engineering team.

It will only be for a few months, but quite a scary prospect when I come to think of it. I will be responsible for doing technical pre-sales work, dealing our US clients, interviewing, hiring a training of engineers, aswell as keeping up with some of my current UK based clients.

As for living, I’ve found a really nice one bed apartment in Chelsea that is only 4 blocks from our office. This has been my first time using AirBnB and so far the process has been OK - the first place I tried fell through, but hopefully this will all be sorted now.

As our CTO pointed out to me, this thing only really happens in startups…and I’ve only been at Qubit since August!

Fun times!

item.title: I will get the hang of this blogging thing....
item.description:
Welcome to my new blog! I have tried to do this blogging so many times in the past, but never really got anywhere with it….lets see what happens this time!…maybe.

Alex
